name: 242-33 thought so
notes:
**knitted shawl in drops alpaca and drops kid-silk. the piece is worked sideways with garter stitch.**

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern z-1000
yarn group a + a or c

-------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
height: measured down middle = approx. 18 cm.
width: measured along top = approx. 127 cm.

**yarn**:
drops alpaca from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
50 g colour 9030, pistachio ice cream
and use:
drops kid-silk fra garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
25 g colour 47, pistachio ice cream


**needles**:
drops circular needle size 5 mm: length 40 cm.

**knitting tension**:
17 stitches in width and 34 rows in height with garter stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
